message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
Take a chance, I'll give you a better deal next round!
I'll give you a slightly better deal this time, but don't get too comfortable!
You're getting desperate, I can smell it! Take it or leave it!
I'm not desperate yet, but I'll give you a slightly better deal. Don't think you're getting away with this easily!
You're running out of time, take what's left!
I'm not giving up yet! You're not getting away with this easily!
You're getting close to empty pockets, take the last crumbs!
I'm not going down without a fight! You're not getting away with this!
You're almost out of options, take the last penny!
I'd rather walk away with nothing than accept this insult!
Fine, you win this round, but I'm not going down without a fight!
